item.title: HELP please, A few, possibly simple problems :)
item.dc:creator: @cderty cderty
item.description:
@cderty wrote:

Hello,
On my server (i’m Using a ‘Kromescape’ Source or whatever source that is based on), When i click the ‘Corporal Beast’ Option on Boss Teleports, It comes up with an error along the lines of:
'Could not find vertex, force closed packet’ It basically freezes, logs me out and then when you re log, you appear at Corp. How can this Force log be solved?

[QUOTE]} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2366,4968,0);
c.sendMessage(“Good luck with the mighty Corporeal Beast!”);
c.sendMessage(“Note: Magic protect, Ruby bolts (e) and Diamond bolts (e) are recommended!”);
c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); [/Quote]

Also, the game Takes a fairly long time to log in, Can anything be done about this?

Finally, When the Bank is maxed out with money (2147m), and you go to put money in via the ‘Bank all’ tab, It lags a while and a mass of ‘bank full!’ messages appear. solution?

Help would much be appreciated

x

Read full topic
